bullets: Integration of Stagehand (AI Agent) with Playwright to build an automated testing platform. This initiative reduced test script creation time by 30% for the QC team and accelerated the release cycle.
Executed a redesign and modernization of the company website, ensuring a user-friendly interface and seamless operation across multiple platforms.
Conducted code reviews, defined coding standards, and provided hands-on mentorship to junior developers and interns, fostering a culture of continuous learning.
